entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:01 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon then light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
